Bookworm Food requires you to unlock all articles for the in-game guide.
 
Articles can be unlocked through a multitude of ways, such as talking to important characters or downloading data from memory sticks.
 
When this achievement is unlocked, all future memory sticks which would be found on the bodies of dead stalkers will be replaced by rare PDAs.

Completionist requires you to unlock all other achievements in the game.
 
This achievement doesn't come with a special reward, but does provide double the amount of rank points normally earned when you unlock an achievement.

Down to Earth requires you to destroy either 3 helicopters with small arms, or just the 1 if you use an explosive weapon such as the RPG or RG-6.
 
When this achievement is unlocked, all Mi-24 "Hind" helicopters will gradually be replaced with the Mi-2 "Hoplite", a much older and weaker aircraft.

Duga Free is only available in story mode, and requires you to disable both the Miracle Machine and the Brain Scorcher.\n \nThis achievement doesn't come with a special reward, but it does become much easier to pass through Yantar and Radar now that their psi-fields have been disabled.

Geologist requires you to detect a minimum of 50 artefacts.
 
Artefact detection requires a detector, which and are sold by most traders. By using them near an anomaly, there is a chance you may detect an artefact.
 
When this achievement is unlocked, the respawn rates of artefacts found in anomalies is slightly increased.

Heavy Pockets requires you to possess 1,000,000 RU at any one moment.\n \nWhen this achievement is unlocked, most traders will begin to offer you special supplies, the same as if you had great relations with their faction.

Infopreneur requires to you deliver a minimum of 50 PDAs to information brokers.
 
PDAs can be found on the bodies of dead stalkers, and can be traded to certain characters by telling them you have information to sell.
 
When this achievement is unlocked, these same characters will offer you a slightly increased reward for any future PDAs you bring them.

Mechanized Warfare requires you to deliver all 3 sets of tools to a single mechanic.
 
Basic, advanced and expert tools can be found mostly in stashes, but can also on occasion be found for sale by certain traders.
 
This achievement doesn't come with a special reward, but you will have the access to a mechanic who can fully upgrade your gear other than Forester - who would charge you much more.

Patriarch requires you to achieve the highest possible rank.
 
Rank can be earned through almost every action that you can take in the Zone.
An article explaining ranks and how they work can be found in the features category.
 
When this achievement is unlocked, you will be able to recruit 2 additional stalkers as companions above your current limit.

Radiotherapy requires you to survive 25 emissions and 25 psi-storms.
 
Emissions and psi-storms occur at random intervals, which can be altered through the weather options section of the main menu.
 
Both of these features they can be toggled at any time during a playthrough, but will need to be enabled in order for you to earn this achievement.
 
When this achievement is unlocked, there is a small chance that you can survive an emission or a psi-vortex without taking cover.

Rag and Bone requires you to loot (at least partially) a minimum of 100 stashes.
 
Stashes can be found almost anywhere in the Zone at any time, but receiving their coordinates after completing tasks will mark them on your map.
 
When this achievement is unlocked, the maximum value of the items that can be found in future generated stashes is slightly increased.

Silver or Lead requires you to either kill 500 stalkers, or make 50 stalkers surrender to you.
 
The requirements for this achievement will likely be met through normal gameplay, but if you are deliberately trying to unlock it, be careful not to kill neutral or friendly stalkers if you value your reputation.
 
When this achievement is unlocked, there is a chance that surrendering stalkers could give you coordinates to an additional stash location.
Tourist requires you to visit all 32 levels in the Zone.\n \nWhen this achievement is unlocked, you will receive coordinates for 3 unique stashes.

Well Dressed requires you to either kill 500 mutants, or field dress 250 mutant parts.\n \nWhen this achievement is unlocked, there is a chance that you will receive additional mutant parts when field dressing.

Wishful Thinking is only available in story mode, and requires you to defeat all 10 waves of the Wish Granter's illusions.\n \nWhen this achievement is unlocked, you will receive a major increase to your rank and reputation.
